reused_details.reused: (AP Photo/Luca Bruno) DOHA, Qatar (AP) ' Luis Enrique was replaced by Luis de la Fuente as Spain's coach on Thursday, two days after the national team was eliminated in the round of 16 at the World Cup.
reused_by_aic: Spain sacked coach Luis Enrique on Thursday after the 2010 champions were dumped out of the World Cup by Morocco at the last-16 stage earlier this week.
Luis Enrique took over in 2018 after Spain's disappointing Russia World Cup showing, and led La Roja to the semi-finals of Euro 2020, where they were also beaten on penalties by Italy.

reused_details.reused: Spain lost to Morocco 3-0 in a penalty shootout after a scoreless draw in regular and extra time.
reused_by_aic: Spain hammered Costa Rica 7-0 in their opening game in Qatar but suffered a shock defeat by Japan that resulted in a second-place finish in Group E. Spain were strong favourites to beat Morocco in the first knockout round but lost 3-0 on penalties after the game finished 0-0 following extra-time.

reused_details.reused: The Spanish soccer federation thanked Luis Enrique, but said it was time to 'start a new project' to keep the growth achieved by the coach in recent years.
reused_by_aic: The federation said they wanted to thank Luis Enrique and his staff for their work, but had decided to start a 'new project'.

reused_details.reused: Luis Enrique was sacked as Spain coach on Thursday after the team's elimination in the last-16 at the World Cup with the country's under-21 manager Luis de la Fuente named as his replacement by the Spanish football federation (RFEF).

reused_details.reused: Spain were beaten on penalties by Morocco after a goalless draw on Tuesday in an upset result after failing to turn their dominance into a victory.
reused_by_aic: Spain hammered Costa Rica 7-0 in their opening game in Qatar but suffered a shock defeat by Japan that resulted in a second-place finish in Group E. reused_details.reused: "The ... RFEF has delivered to the president a report in which it determined that a new project should start for the Spain national team, with the aim of continuing the growth achieved in recent years thanks to the work carried out by Luis Enrique (and the staff).
reused_by_aic: 'The sporting direction of the RFEF has given the president a report, in which it was determined that a new project should start for the national team, with the objective of continuing the growth achieved in the last few years thanks to Luis Enrique and his colleagues,' added the RFEF.

reused_details.reused: "Both the RFEF president Luis Rubiales and sports director, Jose Francisco Molina have informed Luis Enrique of the decision.
reused_by_aic: 'Both the president, Luis Rubiales, and the sporting director, Jose Francisco Molina, have told the coach their decision,' the Spanish FA said in a statement.

reused_details.reused: The RFEF would like to thank Luis Enrique and his entire coaching staff for the work done in the last few years."

reused_details.reused: Spain lost to Morocco 3-0 in a penalty shootout after a scoreless draw in regular and extra time.
reused_by_aic: Spain hammered Costa Rica 7-0 in their opening game in Qatar but suffered a shock defeat by Japan that resulted in a second-place finish in Group E.
